meanings.definition: interaction between two or more things
meanings.sent1: The interplay of colors in the painting created a beautiful harmony.
meanings.sent2: The interplay between the sun and the clouds determined the weather.
meanings.sent3: The interplay of flavors in the dish made it a delightful culinary experience.
meanings.sent4: The interplay of light and shadow on the stage added depth to the performance.
meanings.sent5: The interplay of music and dance mesmerized the audience.

meanings.definition: the way in which two or more things affect each other
meanings.sent1: The interplay of emotions between the characters drove the plot forward.
meanings.sent2: The interplay between supply and demand influences the market prices.
meanings.sent3: The interplay of ideas in the discussion led to a creative solution.
meanings.sent4: The interplay of personalities in the group dynamics shaped the outcome.
meanings.sent5: The interplay of forces in nature can create powerful phenomena.
